issues.summary: [OTP][UAT] Update Welcome Kit copy for SNS orders
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#deebff}
*User Story / Description:*

Daily Greens *Welcome Kit* sections should be updated to communicate that this is for SNS orders only.

Copy should be updated to SNS orders only in the following places:

* Section on {{/products}} page
* Greens product cards on {{/products}} page
* Section on {{/products/greens}} page
* Section on {{/signup}} page

!Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.02.00‚ÄØAM.png|width=321,height=431,alt="Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.02.00‚ÄØAM.png"!

!Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.02.11‚ÄØAM.png|width=448,height=191,alt="Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.02.11‚ÄØAM.png"!

!Screenshot 2025-12-23 at 10.08.51‚ÄØAM.png|width=939,height=762,alt="Screenshot 2025-12-23 at 10.08.51‚ÄØAM.png"!

!Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.01.46‚ÄØAM.png|width=1032,height=565,alt="Screenshot 2025-12-30 at 10.01.46‚ÄØAM.png"!


{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#e3fcef}
*Acceptance Criteria:*

* Ensure the Welcome Kit copy is updated on Section on the following pages
** {{/products}} page
*** Replace the title ‚ÄúFREE Daily Greens Welcome Kit worth $36‚Äú with ‚ÄúSubscribe and Save: FREE Welcome Kit worth $36‚Äú
*** Replace ‚ÄúFree welcome kit with first time purchase of Daily Greens.‚Äú with ‚ÄúGet a free welcome kit with first time subscription order of Daily Greens; Auto-applied at checkout.‚Äú
** Greens product cards on {{/products}} page
*** Replace ‚Äú*Free welcome kit* (worth $36) with first order‚Äú with ‚Äú*Free welcome kit* (worth $36) with first subscription order‚Äú
** Section on {{/products/greens}} page
*** Replace ‚Äúnew customers only‚Äú with ‚ÄúNew subscribers only, auto-applied at checkout‚Äú
** Section on {{/signup}} page
*** Replace ‚Äúnew customers only‚Äú with ‚ÄúNew subscribers only, auto-applied at checkout‚Äú
*** Use the attached image to address the updates. 
!Gemini_Generated_Image_yfdpoqyfdpoqyfdp-20260106-191222.png|width=528,height=496,alt="Gemini_Generated_Image_yfdpoqyfdpoqyfdp-20260106-191222.png"!

*Testing Requirements:*

*Affected Brands:*
{panel}

{panel:bgColor=#deebff}

issues.summary: [OTP][UAT] OTP checkout success message update
Funnel Navigation improvements: Back button from the Recipe Selection page should take customer to Plan Selection page
issues.description:
{panel:bgColor=#eae6ff}
*Expected Outcome*

The expected outcome is ‚Ä¶

When customer click on the ‚Äúback‚Äù button on the recipe (meal) selection page customer should navigate back to the Plan selection page. (Please note: the back button on the browser correctly navigates customer to the plan selection page). See issue in the video attached.

Currently, clicking on the ‚Äúback‚Äù button on the recipe selection page, navigates customers back to the step 1 of the onboarding quiz, which results in customers asked to fill in the essential questions again and wait for the calorie calculation.

Navigating the customer back in the funnel leads to decline in conversion and decline in customer trust with PetsTable digital experience.

*Data required for prioritization:* In what % of sessions, customer click on the ‚Äúback‚Äù button of the recipe selection page. 


{panel}

h3. *Scope (choose one):* {color:#97A0AF}*[ TBD ]*{color}  {color:#FF5630}*[ FIX THE BROKEN ]*{color}  {color:#FF991F}*[ SOLVE UNMET NEEDS ]*{color} {color:#36B37E}*[ ABOVE AND BEYOND NEEDS ]*{color} {color:#00B8D9}*[ INNOVATE ]*{color} 

||*What is the problem we‚Äôre solving for customers?*|Customers currently have to navigate through the questionnaire again if they click on the back button on the recipe selection page. 
As we aim to have a variety of meal plans to offer customers, this will increase the time it takes for customers to make a satisfactory meal plan/recipe choice for their pet.  
Allowing easier navigation from recipe to plan selection page will allow customers to make a decision quickly and move forward in the funnel to address/payment pages.|
||*Why will customers care if we work on this?*|Customers expect the ‚Äúback‚Äù button on recipe selection page to perform the expected action - take them back to plan selection page. Navigating customers back to the step 1 of questionnaire increases effort to complete transaction and reduce customer trust with TPT digital experience.|
||*What company strategy bene

issues.summary: RTE Systems - Update helm Charts & Comply Files with proper team details on applicable repos
issues.description:
Update the *Helm Charts and Comply Files* across applicable repositories to reflect the correct team details for the newly formed *Market Innovation & Optimization(MIO)* team, previously managed under the RTE Systems squad (RTE Systems).

This task involves reviewing and modifying ownership details, metadata, and configuration settings to align with the new team structure and ensure compliance with internal standards.

*Action Items:*

* Identify all relevant repositories requiring updates.
* Review and update team ownership details within Helm Charts.
* Modify Comply Files to reflect the correct MIO team information.
* Ensure consistency across all affected repositories.
* Validate changes through pull request reviews and approvals.

*Reference:*

* Utilize the provided example PRs as a guideline for making the necessary updates.
** [https://github.com/hellofresh/github-automation/blob/master/repositories/tax-service/.comply.yaml|https://github.com/hellofresh/github-automation/blob/master/repositories/tax-service/.comply.yaml]  
** [https://github.com/hellofresh/tax-service/blob/3592ccda8da5c825be6702ceea1a03fa0248228d/ahoy/tax-service/values-live.yaml#L1|https://github.com/hellofresh/tax-service/blob/3592ccda8da5c825be6702ceea1a03fa0248228d/ahoy/tax-service/values-live.yaml#L1]  

*Acceptance Criteria:*

* All applicable repositories have updated Helm Charts and Comply Files.
* PRs are submitted and approved following the team's review process.
* Documentation is updated to reflect the changes where applicable.

This task is critical to maintaining accurate ownership records and ensuring a smooth transition to the new MIO team structure.

issues.summary: Backend services handover documentation
issues.description:
We need to document and align with all stakeholders on the handover and/or deprecation of backend services.

* Complete operational service handovers to other domains following the TRE guidelines.
* Develop a high-level  [+New Ventures: Backend services Ownership and Future plans+|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1shgXBKw6Mfz2uRnHWvSIBnlLmDxi1f71s5SZUqlJWEk/edit?tab=t.0] outlining the deprecation of all TAM backend services.
* Create TRE Handover Guides (e.g.,[+[RTE Manufacturing - Youfoodz] B2B Ownership TRE Handover Guide+|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ySmlmm15SnFye3yB1Fo_TJOuRKaMIB0Nd0uoQR1zEy0/edit?tab=t.0]) by end of 2025. Attach to this ticket and create separate tasks for each.
* *Schedule & Sync:* Finalize by Week 2‚Äì3 of 2026.
* *Kickoff:* Begin in Week 4 of 2026, with completion targeted for Q1 2026.

Backend service list:
